thread.title: Pope to Kenya, Uganda, CAR in Nov on first Africa trip
thread.title_full: Pope to Kenya, Uganda, CAR in Nov on first Africa trip | News24

author: news24.com
title: Pope to Kenya, Uganda, CAR in Nov on first Africa trip
text:
Vatican City - Pope Francis will visit Africa for the first time in November, a trip that will take him from Kenya, to Uganda and the Central African Republic, the Vatican said on Thursday.
The pontiff will visit Kenya from November 25 to 27, spend the next two days in Uganda, and travel on to the Central African Republic (CAR), where the trip will wind up on November 30.
